mapper.select: select plan_id,user_account,item_id,item_name,update_time,day_num,group_num,action_num,break_time,coefficient,threshold,advice,train_type from trainplan where user_account = #{user_account} and update_time IN (select max(update_time) from trainplan where user_account = #{user_account} GROUP BY item_id,train_type)
mapper.update:
update trainplan
coefficient = #{coefficient},
advice = #{advice},
update_time = date_format(#{update_time},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S'),
group_num = #{group_num},
threshold = #{threshold}
plan_id = #{plan_id}
mapper.select: select train_id,user_account,plan_id,group_info,start_time,end_time,train_type from trainInfo where user_account = #{user_account} and plan_id = #{plan_id} and group_info = #{group_info} order by train_id DESC LIMIT 1

select item_id,tp.user_account as user_account, tp.train_type as train_type,ti.plan_id as plan_id,update_time,item_name,day_num,group_num,train_id,start_time,end_time,group_info from trainplan tp LEFT JOIN trainInfo ti ON tp.plan_id = ti.plan_id WHERE tp.update_time > date_format(#{start_time},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') and tp.update_time < date_format(#{end_time},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') and tp.user_account = #{user_account} ORDER BY item_id,update_time DESC

select plan_id,user_account,item_id,item_name,update_time,day_num,group_num,action_num,break_time,coefficient,threshold,advice,train_type from trainplan where user_account = #{user_account} and update_time IN (select max(update_time) from trainplan where user_account = #{user_account} and train_type = 'fastTrain' GROUP BY item_id,train_type)

SELECT user_account,train_id,plan_id,group_info,start_time,end_time,train_type FROM trainInfo WHERE plan_id = #{plan_id} and user_account = #{user_account} AND start_time > date_format(#{start_time},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AND end_time < date_format(#{end_time},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
